title: Reading activities with young children (TEFC)
creator_credit: Edward Milner, Open University and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Examines a variety of reading activities going on in one classroom in an infant school in Cheshire. Shows a sample of activities in pet corner. We also see part of storytime for the youngest children and children reading to the teacher.
creator_credit_for_label: Edward Milner, Open University and British Broadcasting Corporation
